downloadTitle: Office 365 Overview and Business Plan Cheat Sheet

detailsSection: At its heart is Office itself—the familiar Office applications businesses use everyday—now offered as a cloud service, so it’s always up-to-date. But Office 365 is also so much more. It provides businesses with the enterprise-grade productivity and collaboration services they need to work easier, work together and worry less.
